text: Kenneth Kamwi Matengu (born 1978, Katima Mulilo) is a Namibian professor. He was Pro-Vice Chancellor for Research, Innovation and Resources Mobilization at the University of Namibia from 2016 to 2018.http://www.unam.edu.na/news/pro-vice-chancellor-research-innovation-and-development-appointed | University of Namibiahttp://www.we.com.na/news/unam-partners-with-the-best| Namibian Sun On 29 June 2018, Matengu was appointed as the third Vice Chancellor of the University of Namibia becoming the youngest person to assume the position.https://www.thevillager.com.na/articles/13389/unam-appoints-kenneth-matengu-as-vice-chancellor| Unam appoints Kenneth Matengu |The Villagerhttps://www.lelamobile.com/content/75622/Matengu-appointed-as-UNAM-s-new-vice-chancellor| Matengu Appointed as UNAM's New Vice Chancellorhttps://www.newera.com.na/2018/06/22/who-are-these-people-a-rundown-on-unam-vc-candidates| Who are these people a rundown on unam vc candidate| New Era Newspaperhttps://www.namibian.com.na/68917/read/Matengu-is-Unams-new-VC | Matengu is Unams new VChttps://www.namibiansun.com/news/-matengu-gets-unam-top-job2018-06-29| Matengu gets Unam top job - Education - Namibian Sun ==Education== Matengu did his high school at Caprivi Senior Secondary. He holds a Certificate in International Relations from the University of Tampere, Bachelor's degree in Geography and Sociology from the University of Namibia, Doctor of Philosophy, Ph.D (exemia cum laudar) in Innovation Diffusion and Development from the University of Eastern Finland. He has published 50 peer review articles, books and book chapters, as well as international conference papers.http://www.unam.edu.na/news/pro-vice-chancellor-research-innovation-and-development-appointed| University of Namibia | Pro-Vice Chancellor-Research, Innovation and Development Appointedhttps://www.cardiff.ac.uk/news/view/548995-kenneth-matengu-personal-story| Kenneth Matengu Personal Story - News - Cardiff Universityhttps://www.devdiscourse.com/Article/8368-undp-hosts-inaugural-conference-of-igu-commission-on-african-studies | UNDP hosts inaugural conference of IGU Commission on African Studies | Devdiscourse ==References== Category:Namibian people Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Academics
title: Kenneth Matengu
